body:
Bumps [gopkg.in/DataDog/dd-trace-go.v1](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go) from 1.14.0 to 1.15.0.
Release notes *Sourced from [gopkg.in/DataDog/dd-trace-go.v1's releases](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/releases).* > ## 1.15.0 > ### Features > - {ddtrace/tracer,internal/log}: introduce new logging pacakge ([#442](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/442)) > - contrib/labstack/echo: Add error handling ([#451](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/451)) /thanks [@​rafaeljusto](https://github.com/rafaeljusto) > > ### Fixes > - circleci: vendor go-redis/redis for testing. ([#452](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/452)) > - contrib/gin-gonic/gin: set error tag only for 5xx ([#449](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/449)) > > To view all changes check out [new commits](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/compare/v1.14.0...v1.15.0) and the [1.15.0 milestone](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/milestone/29?closed=1).
Commits - [`8d2998b`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/commit/8d2998bc69008aa4553846ac9a044aa730bd4ce4) contrib/gin-gonic/gin: set error tag only for 5xx ([#449](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/449)) - [`48b1168`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/commit/48b1168e8b4f73127c125d7e6cd54d6dd246be10) contrib/labstack/echo: Add error handling ([#451](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/451)) - [`8ebeae8`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/commit/8ebeae8561cce98044d2f53a95c98ce159e5a8f0) circleci: vendor go-redis/redis for testing. ([#452](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/452)) - [`30ce4e4`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/commit/30ce4e46d1fe28b43d2cfd8347ec1e7144575f06) {ddtrace/tracer,internal/log}: introduce new logging pacakge ([#442](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/issues/442)) - See full diff in [compare view](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/compare/v1.14.0...v1.15.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=gopkg.in/DataDog/dd-trace-go.v1&package-manager=go_modules&previous-version=1.14.0&new-version=1.15.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=gopkg.in/DataDog/dd-trace-go.v1&package-manager=go_modules&previous-version=1.14.0&new-version=1.15.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.
title: build(deps): bump gopkg.in/DataDog/dd-trace-go.v1 from 1.14.0 to 1.15.0
